data.last_utter: part of me regrets being unhinged on here bc it’s annoying to have to switch to an alt account whenever I see a thread and see “blocked post”
data.sent_utter: that's why I agree with the X's blocking behavior
data.forecast_utter: mixed feelings but yeah, I like the fact that bsky’s behavior limits harassment/pile ons but I hate whenever it’s just a thread and I’m the one blocked and can’t see it bc usually I switch accounts and it is just like “that’s a nice drawing”
